spec_data.Name: perl-Mail-Mbox-MessageParser
spec_data.Description:
Mail::Mbox::MessageParser is a feature-poor but very fast mbox parser. It uses
the best of three strategies for parsing a mailbox: either using cached folder
information, GNU grep, or highly optimized Perl.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 01:07:19 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A fast and simple mbox folder reader
